Employee Leave Balance
script:
let parser = new DOMParser(); // create a DOMParser object frappe.call("estc_app.estc_hr.doctype.employee.employee.get_current_employee_leave_balance").then(r=>{ root_element.querySelector('#max_leave').textContent= r.message.max_leave root_element.querySelector('#leave_usage').textContent= r.message.use_leave root_element.querySelector('#balance').textContent= r.message.balance root_element.querySelector('#sick_leave').textContent= r.message.max_sick_leave root_element.querySelector('#sick_leave_usage').textContent= r.message.use_sick_leave root_element.querySelector('#sick_leave_balance').textContent= r.message.sick_leave_balance root_element.querySelector('#ot').textContent= r.message.ot root_element.querySelector('#ot_usage').textContent= r.message.use_ot root_element.querySelector('#ot_balance').textContent= r.message.ot_balance r.message.leave_data.forEach((x)=>{ root_element.querySelector("#leave_type_balance").appendChild(createProgress(x)) }) }) function createProgress(d){ d.max_leave = d.max_leave ==0?1:d.max_leave let ui = `
${d.leave_type} (${format_number(d.use_leave,"",2)}/${format_number(d.max_leave,"",2)})
${parseInt((d.use_leave/d.max_leave)*100)}%

` return parser.parseFromString(ui, "text/html").querySelector("div") }
